data.name: Just Shoot
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord and follow the development, share suggestions and tips to improve the game even more!

The Game

You will enter an arena with many enemies, items and weapons! are you able to complete the journey? get the highest score?
Explore the arena and discover its secrets! you will be able to improve your bullets, weapons, health etc..

The game will have 3 arenas that you unlock as you play, each arena has its final boss, after defeating the last one you can
end your journey or continue collecting points and discovering more secrets!

Things we would like to bring to the final game

- Upgrades
- Special skills
- Many enemies
- Challenges
- Secrets
- MORE SECRETS
- Skill Tree
- Many Arenas
- Weapons!
- And many other things to come!

Story without End

Even after completing the journey you can still play, challenging your friends and seeing who has the highest score! in the final version of the game we intend to release more arenas and new game modes! stay tuned to the community server!

data.short_description: Battle with your weapon in an arena full of enemies, use upgrades, collect points, kill the Final Boss and restart the journey!
data.supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
